snippet: SENTENCE OF THE MICHIGAN CONSPIRATORS.--At eleven o'clock yesterday, the prisoners of the railroad conspiracy case were brought up for sentence, at which hour the spacious hall of the firemen's building was crowded to repletion. His Honor Judge Wi...
